para:
The Web Services portion of GT version uses SOAP over HTTP for communicating messages. WS Authentication and Message-Level Security implements the WS-Security standard and the WS-SecureConversation specification to provide message protection for SOAP messages. Features include:
authentication of the sender encryption of the message integrity protection of the message replay attack protection
WS Authentication and Transport-Level Security provides a secure channel by using HTTP over SSL/TLS (HTTPS) for transporting the messages. This security mechanism supports all of the security features provided by SSL/TLS with the addition of support for X.509 Proxy Certificates.
